amendment.description: To specify the qualifications required for instructors in the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4345 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4345 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6348-4349) To specify the qualifications required for instructors in the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4345 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4345 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
